tasks.label: Groovy_CopyRes_DevTest
tasks.command: cd ${workspaceFolder:copy_res}; java -cp ../lib/* org.codehaus.groovy.tools.GroovyStarter --main groovy.ui.GroovyMain src/Main.groovy D:/OZSOURCE80 devTestRes

tasks.label: JSBuilder_BuildJava
tasks.command:
cd ${workspaceFolder:OZFlashToJSConverter}; Remove-Item -Path bin -Recurse -Force; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path bin
 Get-ChildItem -Path src -Recurse -Filter *.java | ForEach-Object { $_.FullName } | Set-Content -Path source_paths.txt
 javac --% -d bin -cp lib/junit.jar -sourcepath "src;src_lib" -source 1.6 -target 1.6 @"source_paths.txt"
 Remove-Item -Path source_paths.txt
